messages.title: My pledges to you
content: I will fight the loss of doctors and other NHS services at our Kent & Canterbury Hospital.
I will campaign for fair school funding to properly resource our local schools.
This area benefits greatly from its links to Europe. I will represent the best possible Brexit deal for Canterbury.
I will support local jobs for local people. Labour will build a diverse economy to safely sustain our futures.
I will prioritise homes that local people can afford. Labour will build homes families need, as we did before, and new homes that aren't just for investors.
Labour will introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and want more investment in skills, infrastructure and new technology locally.

National Education Service to make sure every child matters. We will properly resource and fund schools. I will press within Parliament to raise money for resources and teachers for our local schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight the loss of doctors and other NHS services at Kent & Canterbury Hospital.
Campaign for fair school funding to properly resource local schools.
Represent the best possible Brexit deal for Canterbury.
Support local jobs and build a diverse economy to safely sustain futures.
Prioritise affordable homes for local people and build new homes that are not just for investors.
Introduce a real Living Wage of £10 per hour and increase investment in skills, infrastructure, and new technology locally.
Establish a National Education Service to make sure every child matters and properly fund schools.
